Discount Offer Receive a discount as a return client Times are tough and wed like to save you some money As a valued customer this off our already competitive prices is good on any of our design elements both preexisting and custom orders Just order during the first quarter of If you have an event coming up in you can order anything at all during January February and March and receive off the order We hope that in this small way we can help the event industry and our clients As always we appreciate your business To Take Advantage Of Discount Simply return this EMail with your company name and Email address Order any elements or design sets before Monday April st and we will reserve your off discount which can be used at any time during the calendar year For more information call us at CONCEPT DESIGN PRODUCTIONS INC PRIMROSE AVE MONROVIA CA If you do not wish to receive these emails just simply reply with unsubscribe in the subject box

Corporate Event Budget ChallengedYouve seen the bottom drop out of fall budgets dwindle for Can you adapt fast enough to survive with whats left to fight for We all feel it We design rent upscale corporate event environments sets exhibits displays themed treatments w every support service you can imagine Let us provide quick help with a new TOOL on our web page Complete packages for environments organized by BUDGET LEVEL of value for of cost as usual now packaged with an additional off Just go to our web page click on Stage Sets of Theme Environments and click on the BUDGET BUTTON Levels to Choose from New Concepts Thanks for your time If you do not wish to receive these emails just simply reply with unsubscribe in the subject box

New ProductsTheme Button and Budget Button on CDPI Website Aimed at Helping Planners Concept Design Productions Inc announces two new improvements to their plus page website at The new Theme Button is designed to make event planners jobs easier offering more than environmental elements and stage sets that are categorized by themes ie Western or Patriotic SciFi or Gothic among others With a simple click planners can go directly to pages loaded with structural elements meeting the themed criteria they need Once there they can see just what elements are already constructed and ready to rent or they can view dozens of fabricated environments available to them for a fraction of the cost of custom creation Also debuting on the CDPI website in is the new Budget Button which allows planners with a set budget to immediately access only those scenic elements that fall within that budget It is hoped that such advancements to the existing site will afford planners an easier more costeffective use of their time when planning events Concept Design Productions Inc has a plus year reputation as an innovative leader in the event industry If you would like more information we encourage you to access our website CONCEPT DESIGN PRODUCTIONS INC PRIMROSE AVE MONROVIA CA If you do not wish to receive these emails just simply reply with unsubscribe in the subject box
